title: Unlocking growth potential: Synergistic potassium fertilization for enhanced yield, nutrient uptake, and energy fractions in Chinese cabbage
content:
Publication date: 15 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 7

Author(s): Mahendra Choudhary, Kamal Garg, Marthala Bhuvaneswar Reddy, Babu Lal Meena, Biswajit Mondal, Mangal Deep Tuti, Sudhir Kumar, Mukesh Kumar Awasthi, Balendu Shekher Giri, Sanjeev Kumar, Mahendra Vikram Singh Rajawat
